testcase.classname: Feature to test the add, edit and delete options for the job titles
testcase.name: Verify the add job title functionality - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given the user logins the page with valid credentials.......................passed Given the user is in job titles page........................................passed When the user clicks on Add button in job Titles page.......................passed Then the user is in Add Job Title Page......................................passed When user adds with parameters "Data Analyst", "Analysing the data for projects", "Analysing the data for projects".passed And the user clicks on Save button in Add Job Title Page....................passed Then the newly added "Data Analyst" and "Analysing the data for projects" should be saved and added to the Job Titles records.passed

testcase.classname: Feature to test the add, edit and delete options for the job titles
testcase.name: Verify the edit user and delete job titles functionality - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given the user logins the page with valid credentials.......................passed Given the user navigates to already created job title with "Data Analyst"...passed When the user clicks on edit button for the job with "Data Analyst".........passed Then the user is in Edit Job Title page.....................................passed When user edits with parameters "Data Scientist", "Making decisions on analysed data", "Making decisions on analysed data".passed And the user clicks on Save button in Edit Job Title page...................passed Then the records should be updated as "Data Scientist", "Making decisions on analysed data".passed And user notes the total records of the Job Titles..........................passed When the user clicks on delete button for the user with "Data Scientist" in Job Titles page.passed And the user clicks YES on Are you sure Dialog in Job Titles page...........passed Then the job Title "Data Scientist" will be deleted from the records........passed

testcase.classname: Feature to test the add, edit and delete options for the user
testcase.name: Verify the add user functionality - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given the user logins the page with valid credentials.......................passed Given the user is in user management page...................................passed When the user clicks on Add button in Search Users page.....................passed Then the user is in Add User Page...........................................passed When user adds with parameters "Admin", "Enabled", "Paul Collings", "Bala S", "Bala@123", "Bala@123".passed And the user clicks on Save button in Add User Page.........................passed Then the user with "Bala S" should be saved and added to the user records...passed

testcase.classname: Feature to test the add, edit and delete options for the user
testcase.name: Verify the edit user and delete user functionality - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given the user logins the page with valid credentials.......................passed Given the user navigates to already created user with "Bala S"..............passed When the user clicks on edit button for the user with "Bala S"..............passed Then the user is in Edit User Page..........................................passed When user edits with parameters "ESS", "Disabled"...........................passed And the user clicks on Save button in Edit user page........................passed Then the "Bala S" should be updated to the user records with "ESS", "Disabled".passed And user notes the total records of the users...............................passed When the user clicks on delete button for the user with "Bala S"............passed And the user clicks YES on Are you sure? Dialog.............................passed Then the user will be deleted from the user records.........................passed

testcase.classname: Feature to test the user search
testcase.name: Verify search And reset functionality in user management - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given the user logins the page with valid credentials.......................passed Given the user is in user management page...................................passed And user notes the total records of the users...............................passed When user searches with search parameters "Admin", "Admin", "Paul Collings", "Enabled".passed And clicks on Search button.................................................passed Then the searched user is displayed with the "(1) Record Found".............passed When the user clicks on Reset button........................................passed Then the values in all of the search parameters should be removed...........passed And it should show all the records..........................................passed

testcase.classname: Feature to test the user search
testcase.name: Verify search And reset functionality in user management - Example #1.2
testcase.system-out: Given the user logins the page with valid credentials.......................passed Given the user is in user management page...................................passed And user notes the total records of the users...............................passed When user searches with search parameters "Admin", "Admin", "Paul Collings", "Disabled".passed And clicks on Search button.................................................passed Then the searched user is displayed with the "No Records Found".............passed When the user clicks on Reset button........................................passed Then the values in all of the search parameters should be removed...........passed And it should show all the records..........................................passed
